overview:
Kurt Wedel joined First To FileÂ® in 2008, where he is responsible for expanding the companyâ€™s user base and developing long-term customer relationships through the delivery of a superior customer service experience.

Having 20 years of enterprise software and SaaS experience with early stage organizations, and an established track record of selling to and servicing legal professionals in the worldâ€™s leading corporations, Kurt provides a crucial combination of enterprise-level sales and operation experience, and intellectual property savvy.

Prior to joining First To FileÂ®, Kurt was Vice President of Sales and Operations at Attributor , an online copyright protection firm, where he managed the development of customers such as Reuters, Associated press, Conde Nast, the Financial Times, and Deutsche Press. Previous to that, he held senior sales, marketing, and customer operations positions at MarkMonitor , Oracle Corporation , Sybase , and Netscape Communications.

relationships.title: Vice President of Sales and Operations
